title: LEGO Star Wars: The Mandalorian The Child Building Kit (75318)
description: Build and display a charming LEGO model of The Child from Star Wars: The Mandalorian! This detailed 1,073-piece set captures authentic details of the popular character, affectionately known as Baby Yoda. Features a posable head, movable ears, and an adjustable mouth for different expressions. The set also includes a gearshift knob element – the Child's favorite toy – which can be placed in its hand, plus an information sign and the Child LEGO minifigure to complete a delightful display.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU9527-PLUSH-GIRAFFE
categories: Toys & Games > Plush & Stuffed Animals > Giant Plush Animals
Nursery & Decor > Nursery Decor > Wall Art & Decals
title: Geoffrey's Toy Box Giant Lifelike Plush Giraffe, 4-Foot Stuffed Animal
description: Bring the wonder of the safari right into your child's room with the Geoffrey's Toy Box Giant Lifelike Plush Giraffe! Standing an impressive 4 feet tall, this gentle giant features realistic details, a sturdy wire-framed body, and super-soft plush fur perfect for hugs and imaginative play. Its long legs and neck make it a striking decorative piece for any nursery or playroom. An iconic friend for any animal lover, this giraffe is ready for endless adventures and cuddles.

name: projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/8472910B
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Movie & TV Character Playsets
title: LEGO Creator Expert Ghostbusters ECTO-1 Car Kit
description: Build a stunningly detailed LEGO version of the iconic ECTO-1 car from the Ghostbusters movies. Packed with authentic details, this 2,352-piece set features working steering, a trapdoor with a ghost trap, an extendable rear gunner seat, and a moving ghost sniffer. This immersive build is the ultimate ECTO-1 collectible for Ghostbusters fans and LEGO builders alike, perfect for display.

name: projects/12345/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU884512B
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Robotics & Coding Toys
Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Remote Control Cars & Drones
title: Robo-Explorer Coding Bot with Programmable Path
description: Introduce your child to the world of coding with the Robo-Explorer Coding Bot! This friendly robot helps kids learn basic programming logic through fun, hands-on play. Use the included coding cards or the simple remote control to program a sequence of up to 50 commands, including movements, sounds, and light effects. Watch as Robo-Explorer follows your commands, navigating obstacles and completing missions. It's a perfect STEM toy to foster critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and creativity. No screen required!

text: 3x AAA for Robot, 2x AA for Remote

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/LEGO_75337_SW_ATTE
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Movie & TV Character Playsets
title: LEGO Star Wars AT-TE Walker Building Toy Set 75337
description: Power into battle against the Separatist Droid Army with the mighty AT-TE Walker! This incredible LEGO Star Wars building set (75337) features posable legs, a 360-degree-rotating elevating heavy blaster cannon with 2 stud shooters, a detachable minifigure cockpit, and 2 detailed cabins with space for up to 7 minifigures in total. The set includes 5 LEGO minifigures – Commander Cody, a 212th Clone Gunner and 3 212th Clone Troopers – to pit against 3 Battle Droid LEGO figures and a buildable Dwarf Spider Droid. An awesome gift idea for Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith fans aged 9 and up, this 1,082-piece set offers a rewarding build and hours of creative play.

name: projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/LEGO-60434-SPACE-BASE
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Engineering & Building Sets
title: LEGO City Space Base and Rocket Launchpad Building Toy Set 60434
description: Embark on an out-of-this-world adventure with the LEGO City Space Base and Rocket Launchpad (60434) toy playset for ages 8 and up. This futuristic space exploration set has everything for cosmic adventures, including a main sector with a 360° space crane, a spaceship, a launchpad, a command center and a toy laboratory with a research area and water cooler. The set also includes a futuristic toy construction vehicle, a planet scene with toy energy crystals and an alien figure, plus 6 space crew minifigures for epic role play. Kids can use the toy space crane to hoist cargo, access the toy spaceship and command the launch from the control tower. A great gift for kids who love space playsets and futuristic toys.

name: projects/project-id/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/847219001
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Robotics & Coding Toys
Toys & Games > Building & Construction > Building Blocks & Bricks
title: Code 'N' Climb DinoBot - Interactive Coding Robot for Kids
description: Introduce your child to the exciting world of coding with the Code 'N' Climb DinoBot! This friendly T-Rex follows command sequences that kids create by snapping together colorful, directional code blocks. Watch as DinoBot roars, stomps, and navigates obstacles based on their very first programs. It's a fun, screen-free way to build fundamental logic, problem-solving, and sequencing skills. The set includes the DinoBot, 20 coding blocks, and an activity guide with challenges to get started. Compatible with major building brick brands for extended creative play.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU-78901234
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Robotics & Coding Toys
Toys & Games > Building & Construction > Building Blocks & Bricks
title: Geoffrey's Toy Box Robo-Explorer Coding & Building Kit
description: Unleash your child's inner engineer with Geoffrey's Toy Box Robo-Explorer Coding & Building Kit! This 3-in-1 STEM toy allows kids to build three different robotic models: a rover, a gripper bot, and a dino bot. Using the included remote control or a simple block-based coding app, kids can program their creations to move, make sounds, and light up. The kit includes over 400 building pieces that are compatible with other major brick brands, encouraging endless creative possibilities. It's the perfect blend of construction fun and introductory coding principles, designed to spark curiosity and develop problem-solving skills.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/PLUSH-GG055
categories: Toys & Games > Plush & Stuffed Animals > Giant Plush Animals
Nursery & Decor > Nursery Decor > Wall Art & Decals
title: Toys 'R' Us Geoffrey's Safari Giant Giraffe Plush, 55-Inch
description: Bring the magic of a safari right into your home with the Geoffrey's Safari Giant Giraffe Plush! Standing an impressive 55 inches tall, this huggable, lifelike giraffe is the perfect companion for imaginative play and a stunning decorative piece for any child's bedroom or playroom. Crafted from ultra-soft, durable plush materials with realistic spots and a friendly expression, this giant giraffe is built for endless cuddles and adventures. Its sturdy, yet gentle construction makes it perfect for both playtime and as a comforting friend. A true Toys 'R' Us classic, this giant plush makes an unforgettable gift.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU9528374
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Toys & Games > Building & Construction > Playset Vehicles & Accessories
title: LEGO City Space Explorer Rover and Alien Life Building Set 60431
description: Embark on an out-of-this-world adventure with the LEGO City Space Explorer Rover and Alien Life building set! This detailed 311-piece set lets young astronauts build a rugged 6-wheeled space rover equipped with large all-terrain tires and advanced suspension for traversing rocky planets. The rover features a cockpit for the two included space crew minifigures, a science lab, and a rear living area. The set also includes two mysterious alien figures and a small alien landscape setting with geysers, creating an exciting scene for imaginative play. Perfect for kids who love space and exploration.

name: projects/toysrus-cloud-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/76218LEGOSET
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Toys & Games > Action Figures & Playsets > Superhero Action Figures
Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Engineering & Building Sets
title: LEGO Marvel Sanctum Sanctorum 3-Story Modular Building Set
description: Capture the magic of Doctor Strange with the stunning LEGO Marvel Sanctum Sanctorum (76218), a celebration of the Master of the Mystic Arts – designed with adult enthusiasts in mind. This 2,708-piece recreation of the Sanctum Sanctorum, the notorious residence of Doctor Strange, incorporates classic scenes from Marvel Studios’ Avengers: Infinity War and Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness. The top story houses the museum of mystical collections, the middle section contains the library, and on the ground floor there are familiar features both inside and out. The set includes 9 iconic minifigures: Doctor Strange, Wong, Iron Man, Spider-Man, Ebony Maw, Master Mordo, Sinister Strange, Dead Strange and The Scarlet Witch – a wealth of authentic accessories and several customizable elements, which ensure that this rewarding project delivers great pleasure long after the construction work has finished.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU_STEM_84321A
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Robotics & Coding Toys
Toys & Games > Building & Construction > Engineering & Building Sets
title: Galaxy Explorer Bot - Interactive Coding Robot Kit
description: Embark on an intergalactic journey of learning with the Galaxy Explorer Bot! This interactive robotics kit is designed to introduce young minds to the fundamentals of coding and engineering. Build your own robot from over 200 pieces, then use the simple block-based coding app to program its movements, sounds, and light patterns. The Galaxy Explorer Bot features an obstacle detection sensor, planetary exploration mode, and customizable LED lights. It's the perfect way to combine creativity, construction, and computer science for hours of educational fun. App compatible with iOS and Android devices. Batteries not included.

name: projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/L31152TRU
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Engineering & Building Sets
title: LEGO® Creator 3-in-1 Space Astronaut Building Set 31152
description: Blast off into adventure with the LEGO Creator 3-in-1 Space Astronaut building set! This incredible set offers triple the fun, allowing young builders to create an articulated Space Astronaut with a golden visor and a detachable jetpack. When it's time for a new mission, rebuild the astronaut into a futuristic space dog with posable legs and tail, or a sleek space viper jet. This 647-piece set provides a rewarding build-and-play experience, perfect for sparking creativity and encouraging imaginative play for kids aged 9 and up. Includes a display stand for showing off your out-of-this-world creations.

name: projects/toysrus-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU5501893A

Toys & Games > Building & Construction > Playskool
title: Playskool Transformers Rescue Bots Academy Command Center Hoist
description: Imagine helping Hoist the Tow-Bot save the day! As a mighty tow truck, Hoist is ready to take to the streets and charge to the rescue! Kids ages 3 and up can pretend there is a dangerous situation unfolding and convert the brave 4.5-inch Hoist the Tow-Bot action figure from a robot to a vehicle. This Playskool Heroes Transformers toy features 2-in-1 converting action and includes an articulated hook accessory. Attach the hook to the tow truck's trailer hitch in vehicle mode. In bot mode, the hook can be held by the figure or stored on its back.

name: projects/global/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/toysrus_79110
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Robotics & Coding Toys
Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Remote Control Cars & Drones
title: Unleashed CodeCrafter Rover: STEM Programmable Exploration Vehicle
description: Ignite a passion for coding and robotics with the Unleashed CodeCrafter Rover! This state-of-the-art STEM toy empowers kids to build, program, and explore. Using a simple, block-based coding interface on a tablet or smartphone, young engineers can program the Rover to navigate obstacle courses, perform tasks, and even express itself with customizable lights and sounds. The kit includes all the components to build the rugged, all-terrain rover, plus sensors for detecting objects and following lines. It's hands-on learning that feels like play, perfect for aspiring scientists and programmers.

name: projects/12345/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/884920153342
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Robotics & Coding Toys
Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Remote Control Cars & Drones
title: Unirover Code & Explore Rover - Interactive STEM Coding Robot
description: Embark on an adventure of learning and discovery with the Unirover Code & Explore Rover! This beginner-friendly coding robot introduces kids to the fundamentals of programming through fun, hands-on challenges. Use the intuitive, block-based coding app (available on iOS and Android) to program the Unirover's path, lights, sounds, and even its grabber arm. Navigate obstacle courses, complete missions, and learn core STEM concepts like sequencing, loops, and problem-solving. With its durable all-terrain wheels and friendly robot personality, the Unirover is the perfect companion for any young explorer ready to learn the language of the future.

name: projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-LEGO-CREATOR-98217
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
title: LEGO Creator 3-in-1 Forest Animals: Red Fox Building Toy Set 31154
description: Embark on a woodland adventure with the LEGO Creator 3-in-1 Forest Animals: Red Fox set! This engaging building toy lets kids create three different, charming animal figures. Build a clever and poseable red fox watching a squirrel on a log, then rebuild it into a wise owl perched on a tree branch, or a speedy red squirrel with an acorn. Each model offers a rewarding build and inspires hours of imaginative play. Perfect for young animal lovers and budding builders, this set provides endless creative possibilities.

name: projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-64819-CODINGBOT
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Robotics & Coding Toys
Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Remote Control Cars & Drones
Learning & STEM > Educational Toys
title: Universe Explorers Cosmo-Bot: Programmable STEM Robot
description: Launch your child's imagination into orbit with the Universe Explorers Cosmo-Bot! This engaging, build-it-yourself robot introduces kids to the exciting worlds of robotics and programming. Using an intuitive, block-based visual coding interface on any tablet or smartphone, young engineers can program Cosmo-Bot to navigate obstacle courses, flash its LED lights in custom patterns, and play fun sounds. The kit includes over 150 snap-together pieces, an infrared sensor for object detection, and a remote control for direct play. It's the perfect gift to foster critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and a lifelong passion for STEM.

name: projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/toysrus-60388
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
title: LEGO City Gaming Tournament Truck Building Set 60388
description: Unleash the excitement of eSports with the LEGO City Gaming Tournament Truck! This awesome set features a buildable toy truck with a massive trailer that opens up to reveal a fully equipped gaming arena. Includes 2 gaming stations, a giant screen, winner's trophy, cool merchandise, and 4 minifigures. Perfect for kids who love gaming and creative construction.

categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Robotics & Coding Toys
Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Engineering & Building Sets
Toys & Games > Building & Construction > Building Blocks & Bricks
title: Geoffrey's Toy Lab Build & Code Explorer-Bot 5-in-1 Kit
description: Unleash your child's inner engineer with the Geoffrey's Toy Lab Build & Code Explorer-Bot! This comprehensive 5-in-1 STEM kit allows kids to build five unique robotic models, including a rover, a gripper arm, and more. Using the intuitive block-based coding app (compatible with iOS and Android), young creators can program their Explorer-Bot to navigate obstacle courses, pick up objects, and respond to sensor inputs. The kit includes over 450 pieces, a central processing core, motors, and infrared sensors to provide endless hours of educational fun. It's the perfect way to introduce fundamental concepts of robotics, engineering, and programming in an engaging, hands-on way. No prior coding experience necessary!

title: LEGO® Star Wars™ AT-TE™ Walker 75337 (Frustration-Free Packaging)
description: Power into battle against the Separatist Droid Army, with the mighty AT-TE Walker! This product variant comes in easy-to-open, 100% recyclable, frustration-free packaging. Inside, you'll find the same great LEGO Star Wars set with 1,082 pieces. With Commander Cody in the cockpit, stride across rocky terrain and fire the 360-degree-rotating elevating heavy blaster cannon. Grab weapons and thermal detonators from the cabin and deploy the 212th Clone Troopers to fight the Battle Droids on the ground. Who will triumph on Utapau? It’s up to you!

title: 4M Tin Can Robot - STEM Mechanics Kit - Red Edition
description: Build your own walking, wobbling robot using a recycled soda can with this special Red Edition kit! The 4M Tin Can Robot teaches the value of recycling by repurposing a used can into a fun and functional robotic bug. This STEM kit is ideal for the science enthusiast. It includes all the necessary parts and instructions, just add a soda pop can and a small Phillips screwdriver. Once built, watch it come to life and scurry across the floor. Requires one AA battery (not included).
